title: ValidatePartnershipResponse
description: Response returned after successfully validating a partnership

companyId.description: ID of the company in this partnership

sponsoringPackId.description: ID of the sponsoring pack associated

validatedAt.description: Timestamp when the partnership was validated (ISO 8601 format)

validatedNbTickets.description: Number of tickets allocated at validation time

validatedNbJobOffers.description: Number of job offers allowed at validation time

validatedBoothSize.description: Booth size allocated at validation time (e.g., '3x3m')

agreementSignedUrl.description: URL to the signed agreement document. Null if not yet signed.
